name: decoding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
decode
[ T ] to discover the meaning of information given in a secret or complicated way: Decoding the paintings is not difficult once you know what the component parts symbolize. Compare
encode
[ I or T ]
  language
  specialized to understand the meaning of a word or phrase in a foreign language in the correct way: Grammatical information helps learners to decode sentences.
